summary: jenn tisdale , 33 , from washington dc , filmed two sex scenes with mr deen last month in a new york hotel room .   she prepped by ` treating the whole affair as if i were going to prom ' - getting manicures/pedicures and ` shaving everything '   ' i hardly noticed the larger-than-life camera , ' she said of her porn debut .
